mapper.select: SELECT APPID,DEALID,DEALNAME,ORDERID,NEEDCONFIG FROM dict_t_dealtype ORDER BY APPID, ORDERID
SELECT APPID,DEALID,DEALNAME,ORDERID,NEEDCONFIG FROM dict_t_dealtype WHERE DEALID = #{dealID} AND ( APPID = #{appID} OR APPID = '*')
SELECT DEALID, DEALNAME, APPID, ORDERID, NEEDCONFIG FROM DICT_T_DEALTYPE ORDER BY ORDERID
SELECT APPID FROM DICT_T_APPREGISTER ORDER BY ORDERID
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO dict_t_dealtype ( APPID, DEALID, DEALNAME, ORDERID,NEEDCONFIG ) VALUES ( #{appid}, #{dealid}, #{dealname}, #{orderid}, #{needconfig} )
